skillTree.localised_description: The dread steeds of Chaos are more than mere horses, but creatures tainted by Daemon blood, said to be gifts from the Dark Gods themselves.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: The dread carriages of the Ruinous hosts are more than just machines of war; they are symbols of status and power.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: Once proud and majestic beasts, but now corrupted, malevolent creatures who bear a Chaos Lord into battle – they are the twin-headed Dragons of Chaos.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

skillTree.localised_description: Khargan is crazy for killing, yet killing makes Khargan crazy! It's the literal definition of a vicious circle…
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Violence bordering on absolute delirium; 'berserk' doesn't even come close.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Standing face to face with your enemy means getting to watch the light fade from their eyes when you win.
A leader is needed on the field of battle, able to rally the forces of Chaos in even the most dire situations.
Every dark army requires a particularly twisted mind, capable of thinking three steps ahead of the enemy.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%

skillTree.localised_description: Unleash pure Chaos at close quarters, slicing and dicing all within reach.
A true tactician inspires all around them, encouraging allies to acts of vicious abandon.
"Succumb to pestilence! Let Grandfather Nurgle feed on your suffering!"
The very best warriors don't tire in battle, they just get angrier, and fight with even greater savagery.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 5% for Aspiring Champions, Dragon Ogre Shaggoth, Chosen of Nurgle and Chaos Warriors units
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +5% for Aspiring Champions, Dragon Ogre Shaggoth, Chosen of Nurgle and Chaos Warriors units
	(Hero's army)

Attribute: Strider for Aspiring Champions, Dragon Ogre Shaggoth, Chosen of Nurgle and Chaos Warriors units
	(Hero's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

skillTree.localised_description: Some warriors just want to follow a madman into infamy, and do not care about the inevitable consequences that will follow.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +10 with Warriors of Chaos

skillTree.localised_description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

items.colour_text: To each of his Chieftains Tamurkhan granted a powerful talisman, to enhance their power, but also to yoke it to his own through Nurgle's immense will.

target_if: Leadership is lower than 50% of base

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead
